text: This is a list of BAFTA Award winners for Best Makeup and Hair. The BAFTA Award for Best Makeup and Hair is one of several awards of the British Academy of Film and Television Arts (BAFTA). ==Winners and nominees== 2011: The Iron Lady - Marese Langan * The Artist - Julie Hewett, Cydney Cornell * Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows – Part 2 - Amanda Knight, Lisa Tombli * Hugo - Morag Ross, Jan Archibald * My Week with Marilyn - Jenny Shircore 2010: Alice in Wonderland - Valli O'Reilly & Paul Gooch * Black Swan - Judy Chin & Geordie Sheffer * Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part I - Amanda Knight & Lisa Tomblin * The King's Speech - Frances Hannon * Made in Dagenham - Lizzie Yanni Georgiou 2009: The Young Victoria - Jenny Shircore * Coco Before Chanel - Thi Thanh Tu Nguyen and Jane Milon * An Education - Lizzie Yianni Georgiou * The Imaginarium of Doctor Parnassus - Sarah Monzani * Nine - Peter ‘Swords’ King 2008: The Curious Case of Benjamin Button – Jean Black and Colleen Callaghan * The Dark Knight – Peter Robb-King * The Duchess – Jan Archibald and Daniel Phillips * Frost/Nixon – Edouard Henriques and Kim Santantonio * Milk – Steven E. Anderson and Michael White 2007: The Passionate Life of Edith Piaf (La môme) – Jan Archibald and Didier Lavergne * Atonement – Ivana Primorac * Elizabeth: The Golden Age – Jenny Shircore * Hairspray – Judi Cooper-Sealy and Jordan Samuel * Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street – Ivana Primorac 2006: Pan's Labyrinth (El laberinto del fauno) – José Quetglás and Blanca Sánchez * The Devil Wears Prada – Angel De Angelis and Nicki Ledermann * Marie Antoinette – Desiree Corridoni and Jean-Luc Russier * Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man's Chest – Ve Neill and Martin Samuel * The Queen – Daniel Phillips 2005: The Chronicles of Narnia: The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe – Howard Berger, Nikki Gooley and Gregory Nicotero * Charlie and the Chocolate Factory – Peter Owen and Ivana Primorac * Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire – Nick Dudman, Eithne Fennel and Amanda Knight * Memoirs of a Geisha – Kate Biscoe, Lyndell Quiyou, Kelvin R. Trahan and Noriko Watanabe * Pride and Prejudice – Fae Hammond 2004: The Aviator – Kathryn Blondell, Sian Grigg, and Morag Ross * Finding Neverland – Christine Blundell * Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban – Nick Dudman, Eithne Fennel, and Amanda Knight * House of Flying Daggers (Shi mian mai fu) – Siu-Mui Chau, Lee-na Kwan and Xiaohai Yang * Vera Drake – Christine Blundell 2003: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl – Ve Neill and Martin Samuel * Big Fish – Jean Ann Black and Paul LeBlanc * Cold Mountain – Paul Engelen and Ivana Primorac * Girl with a Pearl Earring – Jenny Shircore * The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King – Peter King, Peter Owen, and Richard Taylor 2002: Frida – Judy Chin, Beatrice De Alba, John E. Jackson, and Regina Reyes * Chicago – Judi Cooper-Sealy and Jordan Samuel * Gangs of New York – Manlio Rocchetti and Aldo Signoretti * The Hours – Jo Allen, Conor O'Sullivan, and Ivana Primorac * The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers – Peter King, Peter Owen, and Richard Taylor 2001: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring – Peter King, Peter Owen and Richard Taylor * Gosford Park – Jan Archibald and Sallie Jaye * Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone – Nick Dudman, Eithne Fennel and Amanda Knight * Moulin Rouge! – Maurizio Silvi and Aldo Signoretti * Planet of the Apes – Rick Baker, Toni G, and Kazuhiro Tsuji 2000: How the Grinch Stole Christmas – Rick Baker, Toni G, Sylvia Nava, Gail Rowell-Ryan and Kazuhiro Tsuji * Chocolat – Naomi Donne * Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon (Wo hu cang long) – Siu-Mui Chau and Yun-Ling Man * Gladiator – Paul Engelen and Graham Johnston * Quills – Nuala Conway and Peter King 1999: Topsy-Turvy - Christine Blundell * American Beauty – Tania McComas, Carol A. O'Connell * The End of the Affair – Christine Beveridge * An Ideal Husband – Peter King 1998 - Elizabeth - Jenny Shircore * Saving Private Ryan – Lois Burwell, Jeanette Freeman * Shakespeare in Love – Lisa Westcott * Velvet Goldmine – Peter King 1997 - The Wings of the Dove - Sallie Jaye, Jan Archibald * L.A. Confidential – John M. Elliott, Scott H. Eddo, Janis Clark * Mrs Brown – Lisa Westcott * Titanic – Tina Earnshaw, Simon Thompson, Kay Georgiou 1996 - The Nutty Professor - Rick Baker, David LeRoy Anderson * 101 Dalmatians – Lynda Armstrong, Martial Corneville, Colin Jamison, Jean-Luc Russier * The English Patient – Fabrizio Sforza, Nigel Booth * Evita – Sarah Monzani, Martin Samuel 1995 - The Madness of King George - Lisa Westcott * Braveheart – Peter Frampton, Paul Pattison, Lois Burwell * Sense and Sensibility – Morag Ross, Jan Archibald * Ed Wood – Ve Neill, Rick Baker and Yolanda Toussieng 1994 - The Adventures of Priscilla, Queen of the Desert - Cassie Hanlon, Angela Conte, Strykermeyer * Interview with the Vampire: The Vampire Chronicles – Stan Winston, Michèle Burke, Jan Archibald * The Mask – Greg Cannom, Sheryl Ptak * Mrs. Doubtfire – Greg Cannom, Ve Neill, Yolanda Toussieng 1993 - Orlando - Morag Ross * Addams Family Values – Kevin Haney, Katherine James, Fred C. Blau, Jr. Fern Buchner * Bram Stoker's Dracula – Greg Cannom, Michèle Burke, Matthew W. Mungle * Schindler's List – Christina Smith, Matthew W. Mungle, Waldemar Pokromski, Pauline Heys, Coco_Coma 1992 - The Last of the Mohicans - Peter Robb-King * Batman Returns – Ve Neill Stan Winston * Chaplin – Wally Schneiderman, Jill Rockow, John Caglione, Jr. * Howards End – Christine Beveridge 1991 - Cyrano de Bergerac Jean-Pierre Eychenne, Michèle Burke * The Addams Family – Fern Buchner, Katherine James, Kevin Haney * Dances with Wolves – - Francisco X. Pérez * Edward Scissorhands – Ve Neill 1990 - Dick Tracy - John Caglione, Jr. Doug Drexler * Ghost – Ben Nye Jr. * Nuovo cinema Paradiso – Maurizio Trani * The Witches – Christine Beveridge, Jim Henson Creature Shop 1989 - The Adventures of Baron Munchausen - Maggie Weston, Fabrizio Sforza, Pam Meager * Batman – Paul Engelen, Nick Dudman * Dangerous Liaisons – Jean-Luc Russier * My Left Foot – Ken Jennings 1988 - The Last Emperor - Fabrizio Sforza * Beetlejuice – Ve Neill, Steve LaPorte, Robert Short * A Handful of Dust – Sally Sutton * RoboCop – Carla Palmer 1987 - Der Name der Rose - Hasso von Hugo * The Fly – Chris Walas, Stephan Dupuis * Hope and Glory – Anna Dryhurst * Jean de Florette – Michèle Dernelle, Jean-Pierre Eychenne 1986 - Ran - Shohichiro Meda, Tameyuki Aimi, Chihako Naito, Noriko Takemizawa * Aliens – Peter Robb-King * Dreamchild – Jenny Shircore * Sid and Nancy – Peter Frampton 1985 - Amadeus - Paul LeBlanc, Dick Smith * The Emerald Forest – Peter Frampton, Paul Engelen, Anna Dryhurst, Luis Michelotti, Beth Presares * Legend – Peter Robb-King, Rob Bottin * Mask – Michael Westmore 1984 Greystoke: The Legend of Tarzan, Lord of the Apes - Paul Engelen, Peter Frampton, Rick Baker, Joan Hills * The Company of Wolves – Jane Royle, Christopher Tucker * The Dresser – Alan Boyle * The Killing Fields – Tommie Manderson 1983 - Tootsie - Dorothy J. Pearl, George Masters, C. Romania Ford, Allen Allen * Heat and Dust – Gordon Kay * Star Wars Episode VI: Return of the Jedi – Phil Tippett, Stuart Freeborn * Zelig – Fern Buchner John Caglione, Jr. 1982 - Quest for Fire - Sarah Monzani Christopher Tucker, Michèle Burke * Blade Runner – Marvin G. title: BAFTA Award for Best Makeup and Hair
